resources.string: Oops! Something you entered is not right. Please try again!
Invalid username and password combination. Please try again.
Give us a chance to make your acquaintance by logging in once while online before you start working offline.
Only the previously signed in user can work offline on this device.
Something went wrong, Please try again.
Please check your WiFi or cellular data connection and try again.
Please type at least 3 characters to search
You can not upload all orders as following orders do not have any line items:\n\n%s
You can not submit all orders as following orders do not have any line items:\n\n%s
Your service request was not able to be sent. Please try again.
The inventory name already exists, please use an unique name.
Please provide a Unique Tracking Number in the following format: AANNNN (two alphabetic characters followed by four numeric digits).
